alert.note: Alert for Washington (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 12 at 2:41PM CST until November 13 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. * WHERE...Washington County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 8 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
